description:
Doctor Drew pinsky has been one of the only doctors out there who has been putting his reputation on the line and taken politics completely out of it to try and get people to understand the true nature of things around covid and hydroxychloriquine dr. Drew has been a doctor for close to 40 years and these news anchors act as though they know more about medicine then him. 
Dr. Drew:""I have prescribed HCQ for hundreds of patients and have never seen an adverse side effect "". New anchor : ""if you do this you will die, you will die "" 
Dr. Drew: ""I know many doctors who have been taking HCQ AS a prentative medicine becuase its so safe""

News anchor : ""noone takes HCQ as a prophylactic"" 
Dr Drew: doctors have every right even if not approved by the FDA to prescribe medicine ""

News anchor: ""Doctors can't prescribe when its not approved by the FDA""

DR Drew: ""the adverse side effects are with chloroquine they are two different drugs ""

News anchor:"" they did a study on both and said it could cause heart issues yada yad yada""

Dr.drew : ""thats chloroquine "" 🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄
I cannot roll my eyes hard enough at these mainstream media imbeciles. .
.
